description: Use the `akamai_appsec_slow_post` data source to update the slow post protection settings for a given security configuration version and policy.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

ConfigId.description: The ID of the security configuration to use.

DurationThresholdTimeout.description: The time in seconds before the first eight kilobytes of the POST body must be received to avoid triggering the specified `action`.

SecurityPolicyId.description: The ID of the security policy to use.

SlowRateAction.description: The action that the rule should trigger (either `alert` or `abort`).

SlowRateThresholdPeriod.description: The slow rate period value: the amount of time in seconds that the server should accept a request to determine whether a POST request is too slow.

SlowRateThresholdRate.description: The average rate in bytes per second over the period specified by `period` before the specified `action` is triggered.

Version.description: The version number of the security configuration to use.
